channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress, To Let sign, Black leather/plastic, 25th October
item.description:
I reported this yesterday and received a notification today saying it was resolved. However the mattress, sign and black leather/plastic things are still there. Could you re-investigate? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glengall Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking Pavement / Obstruction, 25th October
item.description:
Cluster of Lime hire bikes left together on the pavement, reducing pedestrian space and access to the railings. Please request removal and prevent repeated mass parking in this area. Photo taken today for evidence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Offord Road, Barnsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped domestic waste, 25th October
item.description:
Yet more rubbish has been fly tipped. A carpet has now been added to the pile. There is also rubbish blowing everywhere. The place is a mess.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Villiers Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime van drivers, 25th October
item.description:
Lime hire bikes left in motorcycle or car parking bay. Misuse of designated parking space — reduces legal parking availability. Please remove and enforce with operator.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Offord Road, Barnsbury, London

item.title: Regular Fly-tipping, 25th October
item.description:
On going problem of fly-tipping Elysian Avenue with a view to annoying residents. As mentioned before to prevent your having to collect this rubbish regularly something needs to be done to prevent it happening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elysian Avenue, Poverest, London

item.title: Fly-tipped trash at head of Aldeburgh Street, 25th October
item.description:
This fly–tipped rubbish is serving as a magnet for others to add more trash to the pile. I've cleared away a lot of it but please can this be picked up asap. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldeburgh Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Outside the primary schools at the top of Malvern road, 25th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London

item.title: Drain blocked, 25th October
item.description:
This drain has been partially blocked for at least two weeks. The recent fallen leaves have now completely blocked it, and the puddle is getting larger — reaching the side wall and splashing pedestrians as they pass.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Lawrie Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
